welcome_message_body: Welcome to North Las Vegas, where the charm of the desert meets the excitement of the city. Known for its vibrant entertainment and unique attractions, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this dynamic destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: Golden Phoenix Chinese Cuisine
restaurants.description: Golden Phoenix Chinese Cuisine is a chinese restaurant located in North Las Vegas.
restaurants.address: 2345 E Centennial Pkwy, North Las Vegas, NV 89081

terminals.name: North Air Terminal
terminals.description: The North Air Terminal at VGT Airport is a small, single-story terminal that serves general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
